name: refrigerator
description: A hardworking single mother of four children (ages 16, 14, 2, and 1) has recently moved into a new home but lacks basic kitchen appliances to prepare meals for her family. As the sole breadwinner working in food delivery, she is struggling financially to provide these essential items. The family desperately needs a refrigerator to ensure they can store food safely. Any assistance with these kitchen essentials would help this mother care for her young family during this challenging time. Thank you.
